text: Mary Ellen Callahan was a Chief Privacy Officer and Chief Freedom of Information Act Officer (FOIA) (2009 - 2012) of the United States Department of Homeland Security. She was appointed by Secretary Napolitano in March 2009. Callahan is a graduate of the University of Pittsburgh, on whose Board of Trustees she sits, and The University of Chicago Law School. == External links == * Department of Homeland Security: Bio of Chief Privacy Officer: Mary Ellen Callahan * Jenner and Block: Mary Ellen Callahan == References == Category:Year of birth missing (living people) Category:Living people Category:United States Department of Homeland Security officials
title: Mary Ellen Callahan
